QuestData.Title: No Mercy!
QuestData.Description: It is as I told you. They were not merely idle words spoken in a fit of anger.$b$bTime and again, the Horde have demonstrated their disdain for everything we hold dear and holy. They must pay with their lives for their transgressions against the light.$b$bAll of them.$b$bJust imagine a world free of their stain, $n. Envision the joy our children will know. Think of the reverence your descendants will have for your memory, knowing they owe their happiness to you.$b$bNow go, and make that vision a reality!
QuestData.LogDescription: High Captain Justin Bartlett aboard the Skybreaker wants you to kill 15 Horde Players in Icecrown.
QuestData.CompletionText: I trust that you have stained the snow with the blood of our enemies, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n!$b$bHunt them down and make them pay!
